attributes.action: Cut University Fees In the UK Due To Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: It is unfair to ask students to pay the full tuition price, when the majority of facilities will not be available in the ways they were before. Therefore, students will struggle to use resources such as the library. Also, students are not receiving the type of teaching they would have been paying the full price for, therefore, what would us students actually be putting all of that money into?
attributes.background: I want the government or parliament to cut down university fees in the UK, from £9,250 in England to £4,000, and even lower for those who have lower university fees.
